price: But whoever does righteous deeds, being a believer, will have no fear of being wronged or deprived.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
